Putin and Xi reject US 'interference', praise their own ties and trade - KremlinRussian President Vladimir Putin and Chinese President Xi Jinping spoke by phone on Thursday and both rejected what they called U.S. interference in the affairs of other countries, the Kremlin said. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:18:06 GMT X2NVIGZQYVNETKDM3K773G7RVU https://www.reuters.com/world/putin-xi-reject-us-interference-praise-their-own-ties-trade-kremlin-2024-02-08/Reuters世界
Ralph Lauren rides on strong holiday demand, China rebound to post upbeat resultsRalph Lauren on Thursday beat Wall Street expectations for revenue for the 12th straight quarter, powered by robust demand from wealthier U.S. shoppers for its expensive sweaters and shirts, coupled with a strong rebound in China. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:05:38 GMT 23EWM7TJZ5O6DHSMAWO5BLUGSI https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/ralph-lauren-tops-quarterly-sales-estimate-strong-demand-2024-02-08/Reuters商业零售与消费品
EU's Vestager doubts if Big Tech will fully comply with landmark EU rulesEU antitrust chief Margrethe Vestager on Thursday voiced doubts as to whether Big Tech will fully comply with landmark EU rules aimed at reining in their power and ensure a level playing field for smaller rivals. Coach parent Tapestry raises 2024 profit forecast on China demand recoveryCoach parent Tapestry raised its full-year profit forecast on Thursday, banking on full-price sales of its premium satchels and handbags as well as early signs of a demand recovery in its key market China. China's Xi urges 'close strategic coordination' in call with PutinChina's President Xi Jinping told Russian President Vladimir Putin that the two countries should pursue close strategic coordination and defend the sovereignty, security and development interests of their respective countries, state media said. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 11:35:35 GMT VXXJKPILGZNANHLPEK53EJTDCI https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-xi-urges-close-strategic-coordination-call-with-putin-2024-02-08/Reuters世界
Russia's VTB Bank to expand presence in China - CEORussia's state-owned VTB Bank plans to expand its presence in China by opening offices in Beijing and other cities in the near future, the lender's CEO Andrey Kostin said on Thursday at a meeting with a Russian governor. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 11:22:15 GMT 55BM2ZE4PFLALK5L5IZH3ZVDKE https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/ Russias-vtb-bank-expand-presence-china-ceo-2024-02-08/Reuters商业金融
'Firefighter' Wu becomes China's market regulator after routThe new head of China's market regulator is tough on insider trading, fights fires fast, works closely with Communist Party leaders and has managed a stock exchange - a perfect profile for someone taking charge of the country's cratering stock markets. Boeing 'undoubtedly' making progress on quality issues, Avolon CEO saysBoeing is "undoubtedly" making significant progress in getting on top of quality issues, the head of Avolon, the world's second largest aircraft leasing firm and a major Boeing customer, said on Thursday. Taiwan thanks world, PLA shows simulated attacks in new year's messagesPresident Tsai Ing-wen thanked the international community for supporting Taiwan in her Lunar New Year message on Thursday, a day after China's military released a song urging the island to "come home" amid images of simulated missile attacks.
